function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Under-reporting of cases and difficulties in getting tested","Impact":"Increased difficulty in tracking and controlling the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improved testing accessibility and accuracy, and increased transparency in reporting","Technologies":"Improved testing technologies, data analytics for accurate reporting","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimated infection cases due to sensitivity analysis","Impact":"Decreased precision in estimating infection cases, impacting decision-making","Mitigation":"Increased testing, improved data collection and analysis, and development of more accurate modeling techniques","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling and simulation software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, data analysts","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the transmission factor \beta (beta)","Impact":"Lack of insight into key drivers of disease transmission, hindering effective control strategies","Mitigation":"Further modeling and research to explore and quantify the factors influencing \beta, and development of predictive models","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling software, data analytics tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"}]}
